title: Scorecard
text:
import pandas as pd


col = ['Model', 'scaling', 'Oversampling', 'Undersampling','hyper tunning', 'train(macro F1)','test(macro F1)', 'sub score']


df_row = pd.DataFrame(columns = col)
df_row['Model'] = ['DT','et']
# df_row['missing'] = ['X'] # 해당 데이터는 결측치 없음.
df_row['scaling'] = ['X', 'O']
df_row['Oversampling'] = ['X', 'SMOTE']
df_row['Undersampling'] = ['X', 'X']
df_row['hyper tunning'] = ['X', 'O']
df_row['train(macro F1)'] = [1.0, 1.0]
df_row['test(macro F1)'] = [0.69, 0.76]
df_row['sub score'] = [0.73807, 0.76054]

title: Lists to read
text:
0. For Research

시간별 기상 변화를 고려한 LSTM 기반 일사량 예측에 관한 연구



1. GNN

Graph Representation Learning Book
scGCN is a graph convolutional networks algorithm for knowledge transfer in single cell omics
https://wandb.ai/yashkotadia/gatedgcn-pattern/reportlist
Ct Image Denoising With Encoder-Decoder Based Graph Convolutional Networks

https://paperswithcode.com/sota/point-cloud-segmentation-on-pointcloud-c


2. RNN

Learning Phrase Representations using RNN Encoder-Decoder for Statistical Machine Translation
Light Gated Recurrent Units for Speech Recognition

title: resumetable
text:
def resumetable(df):
    print(f'데이터셋 형상: {df.shape}')
    summary = pd.DataFrame(df.dtypes, columns = ['데이터 타입'])
    summary = summary.reset_index()
    summary = summary.rename(columns = {'index':'피처'})
    summary['결측값 개수'] = df.isnull().sum().values
    summary['고윳값 개수'] = df.nunique().values
    summary['첫 번째 값'] = df.loc[0].values
    summary['두 번째 값'] = df.loc[1].values
    summary['세 번째 값'] = df.loc[2].values
            
    return summary
summary = resumetable(train) 
summary

title: downcasting
text:
def downcast(df, verbose=True):
    start_mem = df.memory_usage().sum() / 1024**2
    for col in df.columns:
        dtype_name = df[col].dtype.name
        if dtype_name == 'object':
            pass
        elif dtype_name == 'bool':
            df[col] = df[col].astype('int8')
        elif dtype_name.startswith('int') or (df[col].round() == df[col]).all():
            df[col] = pd.to_numeric(df[col], downcast='integer')
        else:
            df[col] = pd.to_numeric(df[col], downcast='float')
    end_mem = df.memory_usage().sum() / 1024**2
    if verbose:
        print('{:.1f}% 압축됨'.format(100 * (start_mem - end_mem) / start_mem))
    
    return df
all_df = [sales_train, shops, items, item_categories, test]
for df in all_df:
    df = downcast(df)

int8 (Byte) : -128~127
int16 (integer) : -32768~32768
int32 (integer) : -2147483648~2147483647
int64 (integer) : very very big
uint8 (unsigned integer) : 0~255
uint16 (unsigned integer) : 0~65535
uint32 (unsigned integer) : 0~4294967295
uint64 (unsigned integer) :0~very very big
float (shortand for float64)
float16 (Half precision float)
float32 (Single precision float)
float64

title: data visualization
text:
target Distribution (+비율)
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib as mpl
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.rcParams['font.family'] = 'Malgun Gothic'  ## 한글깨짐 방지
def write_percent(ax, total_size):
    for patch in ax.patches:
        height = patch.get_height() # 도형 높이 (데이터 개수)
        width = patch.get_width()
        left_coord = patch.get_x()
        percent = height/total_size*100 # target ratio
        
        ax.text(left_coord + width/2.0,
                height + total_size*0.001,
                '{:1.1f}%'.format(percent),
                ha = 'center')
   
mpl.rc('font', size=15)
plt.figure(figsize=(7,6))

ax = sns.countplot(x='target', data=train)
write_percent(ax, len(train))
ax.set_title('Target Distribution')

title: data visualization
text:
그룹별 요약통계량 분포 시각화
figure, ax = plt.subplots()
figure.set_size_inches(11, 5)

# 상품분류별 총 상품 판매량
group_cat_sum = train.groupby('item_category_id').agg({'item_cnt_day':'sum'})
group_cat_sum = group_cat_sum.reset_index()

# 월간 판매량이 10,000개를 초과하는 상품분류만 추출
group_cat_sum2 = group_cat_sum[group_cat_sum['item_cnt_day'] > 10000].sort_values(by='item_cnt_day', ascending=False)

# 상품분류별 총 상품 판매량 막대 그래프
sns.barplot(x='item_category_id', y='item_cnt_day', data=group_cat_sum2, order=group_cat_sum2['item_category_id'])
ax.set(title='Distribution of total item counts by item category id',
       xlabel='Data block number',
       ylabel='Total item counts')
ax.tick_params(axis='x', labelrotation=90) # x축 라벨 회전
